ygData.subject: Re: Hollow Skull
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is the hollow skull quest, a pretty nice quest for mage types.  You need to have a group at about 30 to complete the quest (The last mob you have to
ygData.messageBody:
>I found a hollow skull with in the karanas somewhere, which is a container
>with only 2 slots and a combine button, It came off of a gnoll looking
>animal, with white fur, shortly after a zone that i can't remember which it
>is - Anyone know what this is used for? and what goes inside it? :)

This is the hollow skull quest, a pretty nice quest for mage types. You
need to have a group at about 30 to complete the quest (The last mob you
have to kill is about level 32). The gnoll assassin you killed was chasing
a NPC named Yiz Pon. Talk to him and he'll get you started on the quest.

Sandeep
